content: Nvidia reported strong earnings, attributing its success to three platform shifts: GPU-accelerated computing, generative AI transforming applications, and the emergence of agentic and physical AI.
Geopolitical and regulatory shifts in AI include U.S. approval of advanced AI chip sales to Middle Eastern firms and a proposed federal "Genesis" AI initiative.
OpenAI launched a teacher-focused ChatGPT workspace.
AI music startup Suno raised $250 million amidst ongoing copyright battles and rapid consumer-driven revenue growth.
